thread.title: Successful homecoming season for Hampton's David Watford
thread.title_full: Successful homecoming season for Hampton's David Watford

title: Successful homecoming season for Hampton's David Watford
text:
Successful homecoming season for Hampton's David Watford HU quarterback David Watford transferred back home from UVA and is sure he made the right decision. Post to Facebook Successful homecoming season for Hampton's David Watford HU quarterback David Watford transferred back home from UVA and is sure he made the right decision. Check out this story on 13newsnow.com: http://on.wvec.com/1LQ1gP0 Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Successful homecoming season for Hampton's David Watford Having transferred back home to attend Hampton University, Pirates quarterback, David Watford is sure he made the right decision. Scott Cash , 13News Now 6:57 p.m. EDT October 22, 2015 CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
This Saturday is part of homecoming weekend for William and Mary. Hampton heads to Williamsburg to provide the competition. For HU's quarterback David Watford it's something of a homecoming season. 
After starring for the Hampton High School Crabbers, Watford spent four years at UVA. After losing his starting job, he decided to move on. That meant a return home to attend Hampton University. 
So far, he has lead the Pirates to a 4-3 record and contention in the MEAC. Read or Share this story: http://on.wvec.com/1LQ1gP0 TOP VIDEOS
